name: THE HERO RETURNS
author: teal
notes:
Three Anki below, I didn't even bother fleshing out the Extra Deck. This shits just absurdly broken, it has favorable MU against like, every single deck. 36 wins from Plat 4 -> KoG but every single loss aside from 1 was while playing REZ or Sylvan. This deck had 1 loss total in Legend and it was a D-Hero Mirror. Konami got a problem on their hands because these  rough drafts of decks are still so incredibly good
I don't have another Chalice or I'd be running it over a WoD
